verbs.description: [V: planned] [ARG1: parenthood shooter] ‘ happy’ with his attack the man who admits to killing three people at a colorado springs planned parenthood clinic last fall told police he dreamed he ’ll be met in heaven by aborted fetuses wanting to thank him to saving unborn babies according to newly released court docu jerry schiffelbein robert louis dear jr colorado springs colorado
